features: Collapsible design shrinks to 1.7" high disc for great packability
Folding handle locks down for drinking and out for scooping and measuring
Sure-sealing lid made of Infinity Clear Polypropylene screws into the rim of the mug to keep your meals in and the outdoors out
Molded in graduations for accurate measuring
Includes: 22 fl. oz. Collapsible Mug, Lid
